segments.text: I hear that there is a festival called Duanwu in China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It is also called Dragon Boat Festival .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you celebrating this festival ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We celebrate it to commemorate a great patriotic poet of China â€” Qu Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you do on that day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll have rice dumplings . What's more , there are also dragon boat matches in some places of southern China .
segments.speaker: S2
